Text: The Village (2004 film):  The film is about a village whose inhabitants live in fear of creatures inhabiting the woods beyond it referred to as "Those We Don't Speak Of."

Text: The Village (2004 film):  Like other films written and directed by Shyamalan from the same time period, "The Village" has a twist ending.
